<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">c2f9f1a09368725005087efdfaba1080</macroponent><name>calendar_1/events</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({ api, helpers }) {
    const record = api.data.look_up_a_single_record_1.result || api.data.look_up_a_single_record_1;
    if (!record) return [];

    const calObj = {
        id: record.sys_id.value || record.sys_id,
        title: record.room_name.displayValue || record.room_name || 'Reservation',
        start: record.planned_start.displayValue || record.planned_start,
        end: record.planned_end.displayValue || record.planned_end
    };

    return [calObj];
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-15 14:26:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>c49b49ea9364fa5005087efdfaba10db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>calendar_1/events</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowRoom" source="x_1782765_nowroom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowRoom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c49b49ea9364fa5005087efdfaba10db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-17 17:00:47</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
